item.description:
Shop, sell and socialize!  Stop by and check out some great items at amazing deals from your meetup members.  If you would like to sell your stuff, email the organizer for details - limited to 10 people. 

 

Sale will be from 9 am to 3 pm
Sellers: You may leave earlier if you like, but please be there and all set up by 9 am if possible. I'll be there around 8 am.

It will be at 158 Hayden Rowe (Route 85) in Hopkinton.  Can't miss it!  Less than 2 miles from the center of Hopkinton.

Sellers will need to bring their own tables and/or blankets to display items.
item.name: Meetup Yard Sale
